Posts.Content: Hi i Found out in December i had Grade 2 Breast Cancer and after the shock and waiting until after christmas to tell my Daughters age 24 and 19 then got my head around this and had some fantastic care lovely nurses and oncologists  I have just finished 6 lots of chemo 3 x Fec 3 x Dosetaxil I have had a new Scan and the news was they could not find any Cancer so me and my Husband cried all the way Home Happy tears…….and i have surgery booked for June 4th to have an Implant immediate reconstruction i agonised over this as only on the morning that i went to see my surgeon and Breast care nurse i was going to have my Breast made from my back muscle then changed my mind as this will be my only chance to use my own skin and avoid Invasive surgery I have not had Radiotherapy yet I am going to have 15 x sessions Mon-fri over 3 weeks….. They are going to I am so scared of making the wrong choice ! I did ask the Surgeon if this Implant fails can i still have a Breast made from my back and she said yes ! Can any one here help has anyone been in this situation as it would be a great Help to hear other peoples choices and if they were the right ones i do know everyone is different, i am just a bit worried about the Radiotherapy they tell me it is 50/50 ?  Love and Strengh to all women out there x
Posts.Title: what reconstruction to have
